trans-unit.source: Represents a network interface message property.
trans-unit.target: 表示網路介面訊息屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified interface index.
trans-unit.target: 指定的介面索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty" /> class using a specified interfaceIndex.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 interfaceIndex，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a message and properties to add into the message property.
trans-unit.target: 指定要新增到訊息屬性中的訊息和屬性。

trans-unit.source: The message to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a message to add into the message properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定要新增到訊息屬性中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The properties to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a property to add into the message properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定要新增到訊息屬性中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that specifies the interface index for the message property.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定訊息屬性的介面索引。

trans-unit.source: The value that specifies the interface index for the message property.
trans-unit.target: 指定訊息屬性的介面索引的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified name for the network interface message property.
trans-unit.target: 取得網路介面訊息屬性的指定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified name for the network interface message property.
trans-unit.target: 網路介面訊息屬性的指定名稱。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get the NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty from a specified message or collection of message properties.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從指定訊息或訊息屬性集合取得 NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty。

trans-unit.source: The message from which the network interface message properties are to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 從其中擷取網路介面訊息屬性的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The method returns true, networkInterfaceMessageProperty contains a NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty that is associated with the message.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會傳回 true，networkInterfaceMessageProperty 包含和訊息相關聯的 NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get the NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty from the properties of a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從指定訊息的屬性取得 NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> when a value for the NetworkInterfaceMessageproperty is obtained from the message; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 NetworkInterfaceMessageproperty 的值是從訊息取得，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The MessageProperties from which the network interfaces message properties are to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 從其中擷取網路介面訊息屬性的 MessageProperties。

trans-unit.source: The method returns true, networkInterfaceMessageProperty contains a NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty that is associated with the properties.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會傳回 true，networkInterfaceMessageProperty 包含和屬性相關聯的 NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get the NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty from a specified collection of message properties.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從指定的訊息屬性集合取得 NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> when a value for the NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty is obtained from the properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty 的值是從屬性取得，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
